code: import{CheckBadgeIcon,CpuChipIcon}from"@heroicons/react/24/outline";import React from"react";import{skills}from"../data";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Skills(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"skills",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container px-5 py-10 mx-auto",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-center mb-20",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CpuChipIcon,{className:"w-10 inline-block mb-4"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"sm:text-4xl text-3xl font-medium title-font mb-4",children:"Skills & Technologies"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-base leading-relaxed xl:w-2/4 lg:w-3/4 mx-auto",children:"I am proficient in a wide range of technologies such as React, JavaScript, WordPress, Java, C#, Node & PHP."})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex flex-wrap lg:w-4/5 sm:mx-auto sm:mb-2 -mx-2",children:skills.map(function(skill){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"p-2 sm:w-1/2 w-full",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-gray-800 rounded flex p-4 h-full items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CheckBadgeIcon,{className:"text-green-400 w-6 h-6 flex-shrink-zero mr-4"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"title-font font-medium text-white",children:skill})]})},skill);})})]})});}
